content: i was asked to make a dobby hat for a friend to use as part of a halloween costume at first i wasn t sure what a dobby was then i did some research and realized he was a character in harry potter i hope you will want to make a dobby the house elf hat as well supplies you will need to make this pattern worsted weight yarn in oatmeal green and black white felt scrap size i crochet hook pattern for your favourite hat a tiny bit of white yarn or embroidery floss for the eye detail a tiny bit of brown or black yarn for the mouth detail a yarn needle embroidery needle or hot glue gun for attaching the details ******** note this is only a pattern for the details on the dobby hat you will need to make a hat using oatmeal coloured yarn with your favourite hat pattern first then follow my pattern to make the ears nose eyes eyelids and facial shaping for dobby there is a video tutorial for this pattern on my youtube channel i no longer have a website so there are no written instructions
